properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM WISHLIST JOIN ITEM USING (ITEM_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND ITEM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , A.* FROM (SELECT ITEM_CODE,ITEM_NAME, ROUND(ITEM_PRICE - (ITEM_PRICE * ITEM_DISCOUNT),-2) DISCOUNT_PRICE, ITEM_PRICE, ITEM_DISCOUNT, ITEM_IMG_PATH from WISHLIST JOIN ITEM USING (ITEM_CODE) JOIN ITEM_IMG ON (ITEM_CODE = ITEM_IMG_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_NO = ? AND ITEM_STATUS = 'Y' ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
